summary: For anyone who has not fully understood the controversial Bitcoin yet, this is a concise and informative crash course about Money and Crypto Currencies.
cast: John Barrett|Andreas M. Antonopoulos|Jeffrey A. Tucker|Matt Miller|Naomi Brockwell|Roger Ver|Bruce Fenton|Vitalik Buterin|Paul Vigna|Michael Casey|Elizabeth Ploshay
title: Bitcoin: The End of Money as We Know It
